 Albert Lincoln Roker Jr is a television personality for the NBC News He  in       is one of the four presenters who  on the  They interview  then credited as the author of  along with his parents  questions Butters if he is concerned about someone using the book to kill others When  mentions Ronald Reagan as an example Butters goes into a trance and plans to kill Ronald Reagan only for  to remind Butters that the former president is already dead  Later during the release of the second book   is  reporting outside a book store where people are queuing to purchase the book carrying buckets to vomit in    has short balding black hair and wears a black suit with red checkered tie and a pair of glasses        zh
